label: AM308L: 8-in-1 IAQ Sensor (without display)
description: AM308L is an 8-in-1 ambient monitoring sensor including measurements of temperature, humidity, CO2 concentration, TVOC, pressure, light, motion, PM2.5 & PM10, etc. Unlike AM308, it does not have a display for visual output. It transmits data to a network server using LoRaWANÂ® technology.
